basicInfo.name: Pallanus
basicInfo.flavor: When the world plunged into chaos after the monsters' invasion, the king ordered Pallanus to end the war quickly. However, the explosion destroyed the world along with the monsters.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Starting battles with at least 1 of both Defense and Support hero(es) on your team has a 50% chance to inflict 1 stack(s) of [Mark: Energia's Saturation]. [Max: 2 Stack(s)]
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - Converts to Defense-Ignoring damage if the target has at least 2 stack(s) of [Mark: Energia's Saturation].
 - All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 17% of damage dealt if the target has at least 1 stack(s) of [Mark: Energia's Saturation].
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Single Enemy
 - Adds Effect: Starting battles with at least 1 of both Defense and Support hero(es) on your team has a 50% chance to inflict 1 stack(s) of [Mark: Energia's Saturation]. [Max: 2 Stack(s)]

Skill 1.name: Formidable Strike
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Starting battles with at least 1 of both Defense and Support hero(es) on your team has a 100% chance to inflict 1 stack(s) of [Mark: Energia's Saturation]. [Max: 2 Stack(s)]
 - Deals Piercing damage equal to 57% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
 - Converts to Defense-Ignoring damage if the target has at least 2 stack(s) of [Mark: Energia's Saturation].
 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 2 Turn(s)]
 - All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 24% of damage dealt if the target has at least 1 stack(s) of [Mark: Energia's Saturation].
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 67% of Physical Attack.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - All Enemies
 - Adds Effect: Additional 100% Weakness Hit Chance.

Skill 2.name: Operation: Annihilation
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Starting battles with at least 1 of both Defense and Support hero(es) on your team has a 100% chance to inflict 1 stack(s) of [Mark: Energia's Saturation]. [Max: 2 Stack(s)]
 - Deals damage equal to 77% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
 - Converts to Defense-Ignoring damage if the target has at least 2 stack(s) of [Mark: Energia's Saturation].
 - All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 24% of damage dealt if the target has at least 1 stack(s) of [Mark: Energia's Saturation].
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - All Enemies
 - Adds Effect: Additional 100% Weakness Hit Chance.

Passive.name: Commander's Strength
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Attack-Based Reduced Damage Taken Boost [Always Active]
 - Grants Guts. [Once per Battle]
 - Grants All Damage Immunity upon triggering Guts. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Enemy with the highest current HP
 - Grants HP Swap upon triggering Guts.
 - All Allies
 - Grants All Debuff Removal when HP falls to 30% or lower. [1 Time(s) per Battle]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: Grants All Damage Immunity upon triggering Guts. [2 Turn(s)]
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Allies (Self, Defense, Support)
 - Adds Effect: 28% Incoming Healing Boost.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Platin, Colt, protein rich food, order, honor, self praise.
profile.dislikes: Failure, Seven Knights, Mercure, greasy food, chaos, evil, refusing orders, going astray
profile.story: When the world plunged into chaos after the monsters' invasion, the king ordered Pallanus to end the war quickly. However, the explosion destroyed the world along with the monsters.

basicInfo.name: Pallanus
basicInfo.flavor: With her extraordinary intelligence and physical capabilities, she made herself known as soon as she joined the royal army. Favored by the king who recognized her talents, she became a commander despite her young age.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - Converts to Defense-Ignoring damage if the target has at least 2 stack(s) of [Mark: Energia's Saturation].
 - All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 17% of damage dealt if the target has at least 1 stack(s) of [Mark: Energia's Saturation].
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Formidable Strike
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Starting battles with at least 1 of both Defense and Support hero(es) on your team has a 100% chance to inflict 1 stack(s) of [Mark: Energia's Saturation]. [Max: 2 Stack(s)]
 - Deals Piercing damage equal to 52% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
 - Converts to Defense-Ignoring damage if the target has at least 2 stack(s) of [Mark: Energia's Saturation].
 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 2 Turn(s)]
 - All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 21% of damage dealt if the target has at least 1 stack(s) of [Mark: Energia's Saturation].
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 52% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Operation: Annihilation
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Starting battles with at least 1 of both Defense and Support hero(es) on your team has a 100% chance to inflict 1 stack(s) of [Mark: Energia's Saturation]. [Max: 2 Stack(s)]
 - Deals damage equal to 70% of Physical Attack 2 time(s).
 - Converts to Defense-Ignoring damage if the target has at least 2 stack(s) of [Mark: Energia's Saturation].
 - All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 21% of damage dealt if the target has at least 1 stack(s) of [Mark: Energia's Saturation].
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 70% of Physical Attack.

Passive.desc:
Self

 - Grants Guts. [Once per Battle]

basicInfo.name: Pallanus
basicInfo.flavor: Born the daughter of an honorable general, she was despised by her own father who wanted a son. But she showed great strength from a young age and grew up like a son, training in martial arts.
